title: Fight Unions With NFTs? Where Have All The Tickets Gone? 4.07.22
itunes:title: Fight Unions With NFTs? Where Have All The Tickets Gone? 4.07.22
description:
In episode 1221, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian and co-host of the Young Old podcast Dana Donnelly to discuss... Perfect storm for high rent, Speaking of overlords...Howard Shultz, Online ticket purchases are broken and more!

  1. Perfect storm for high rent
  2. Speaking of overlords...Howard Shultz
  3. Online ticket purchases are broken
  4. Fatboy Slim fans criticise 'shambolic' ticket queue system
  5. Concert Ticketing Business Finally Meets The 21st Century. Welcome.

LISTEN: I Want Your Soul by Armand Van Helden

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
